WorkItem.Description:
ましろ色シンフォニー will just error out with "illegal execution environment" message while NTLEA 0.931 has no issue to launch it.

the other issue is that Timezone and component can't be customized, so I can't experiment with them to try to get things work
WorkItem.Summary: some games simply error out with NTLEAS, but works with NTLEA
